name: Meadows
description:
Meadows is a proc-gen demo produced for #procjam 14

It makes an island and then repeatedly seeds it with proc-gen plant forms which only grow in areas of colour that match their nutritional requirements (red,green,blue)

Hit R to regenerate the world/plants

Stuff that could be improved: plants do have a method for mutation and spread, but i took it out for this demo, because it wasnt working quite right. Would be nice to be able to destry plants, pick up their seed (gene) and replant them. Id like more ambient life, appearing due to plants growth/influence. and more stufff !!!
